name: Item Tips
description: Buy the Simple Lantern early - cave visibility is essential. Stack totems before boss fights for maximum effect.

name: Potion Strategy
description: Use Luck Potions when farming rare ores. Miner Potions are best for long cave sessions.

name: Essence Farming
description: Higher-tier essences drop from stronger enemies. Save Superior Essences for endgame gear upgrades.

name: The Forge Wiki
description: Your complete guide to The Forge on Roblox. Find detailed information on ores, weapons, armor, enemies, and more.
